root.name: Electric Crayon 3.1: Super Mario Bros & Friends: When I Grow Up
root.description: This is another entry in the Electric Crayon computer coloring book series. It has 29 different pictures you can color. All the pictures are of Mario and friends and some sort of job. There are 16 colors to choose from when coloring a picture. You can mix that color with any of the other 15 for a total of 256 colors. picking a color and then clicking part of the picture will fill that part of the picture up with the selected color. Each picture describes the job that is being shown to help educate people on the job. Several of the pictures feature animated parts. Pictures could be printed in many styles such as calendar, banner, message and so forth.
